main event: A civilian observed unidentified flying objects with yellow and red lights passing to the North and then hovering, followed by a rapid movement to an easterly direction on December 5, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes., The objects were reported to have no sound., Three large objects were silhouetted and appeared to be 1/4 mile in diameter., Many smaller objects converged and grouped into one object before dropping out of sight., The observer was a 47-year-old electrician with a credible background.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects with yellow and red lights
witness description: C. A. SIT., Jr., age 47 years old, electrician, foreman of electrical department of the Chrysler Corporation
